title: Game stuck at loading screen 0% whilst everyone else loads.
body: Uhh so I've had this problem since patch 8.13 and in the loading screen, everyone on the screen is 0%. Of course, for others the game loads in fine, but I seem to be stuck on 0% and 0 ping. I can't get into agame unless I task manager it and close it/reconnect, but I'd like a fix that would let me play nor.ally without task manager. I've tried full client repair and hextech repair tool. Got 20 Min leavers for this now. S.O.S!

replies.body:
Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) 

Under **General** select all options

Under **DNS** select "Public"

Under **Firewall** select "Add Firewall Exception"

Under **Game** select "Uninstall" then "Clean Reinstall"

Let us know if you still experience this afterwards.
